altername_name: J. League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!
name: J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!
overview: J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! (Ｊリーグ プロサッカークラブをつくろう！ or J.LEAGUE プロサッカークラブをつくろう！) is a 1999 football management simulation by Sega for the Sega Dreamcast released exclusively in Japan. It is the third in Sega's Let's Make!!/Tsukurou series of management simulations.
